title: Tether Buys the Dip With $97M Bitcoin Purchase
contentSnippet: Tether's Bitcoin buy amid a market pullback signals confidence, some experts suggest, while others indicate it could be portfolio rebalancing.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Holds $100K as Altcoins Extend Losses, AI Tokens Defy Trend
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s slide to $100,600 caps another week of losses due to renewed Fed caution. Ether and most altcoins are struggling, though AI-linked tokens are seeing outsized gains.

title: U.S. Bitcoin ETF Flows Turn Positive After Six Days of Outflows
contentSnippet: U.S. bitcoin ETFs record $240 million in inflows as market sentiment faces pressure from the ongoing government shutdown.

title: Crypto Tracing Leads to Arrest in Global Child Abuse Network Takedown
contentSnippet: The dark web platforms had 350,000 registered users before blockchain analysis exposed the alleged administrator hiding in Brazil.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest buys $9 million of Ethereum-treasury firm BitMine’s shares amid 10% price drop
contentSnippet: BitMine is the largest Ethereum treasury company, holding nearly 3.4 million ETH ($11.2 billion) as of Nov. 2.

title: Bitcoin hovers above $100,000 as whale buying and ETF inflows lift sentiment: analysts
contentSnippet: Analysts flagged early signs of market stability as whales accumulated nearly 30,000 BTC and ETF inflows turned positive.

title: Bitcoin Minder IREN Posts Record First-Quarter Earnings, Looks to Growth in AI
contentSnippet: The company is targeting $3.4 billion in AI Cloud ARR by end of 2026 with expansion to 140,000 GPUs and strengthened financing position.

title: Filecoin Soars 70% After Breaking Through $2 as DePIN Sector Rallies
contentSnippet: Technical breakout occurred on exceptional volume as decentralized storage tokens demonstrated sector leadership over mixed crypto markets.

title: Robinhood’s Crypto Revenue Miss Tempers Solid Quarter: JPMorgan
contentSnippet: The Wall Street bank lifted its HOOD price target to $130 and reiterated its neutral rating on the stock.

title: Bitcoin Weakness Sends a Warning to Stocks, but Liquidity May Soon Turn, Citi Says
contentSnippet: The Wall Street bank said fading crypto momentum could be flagging trouble for equities, though improving liquidity may revive the year-end rally.

title: Market Maker Flowdesk Says Crypto Credit Is Finding a Fragile Balance
contentSnippet: DeFi lenders are deleveraging but not retreating, with borrowing demand for majors like SOL and BTC staying firm and yields compressing across Maple and JitoSOL.

title: Elon Musk’s $1 Trillion Pay Vote Sparks ‘TRILLIONS’ Token Frenzy
contentSnippet: Tesla’s shareholder approval — with over 75% support — follows months of debate over Musk’s expanding influence across Tesla, xAI, SpaceX, and X (formerly Twitter).

title: US spot bitcoin ETFs see $240 million in inflows, ending six-day outflow streak
contentSnippet: Thursday's inflows brought an end to a six-day streak of outflows, during which a total of $2.05 billion exited the ETFs.

title: Zcash Breaks Into Top-20 Crypto List, Hits $600 for First Time Since 2018
contentSnippet: Daily trading volume has jumped to over $1.8 billion, with liquidity deepening across major venues such as Binance, Hyperliquid, and Bybit.

title: Google Threat Report Links AI-powered Malware to DPRK Crypto Theft
contentSnippet: New research from Google’s threat unit shows hackers are using LLMs to mutate malware and study how to steal from crypto wallets.

title: Can Bitcoin End Q4 on a Positive Note? Here's What the Experts Think
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s sideways drift has deepened concerns about year-end performance as macro risks weigh on sentiment and liquidity.

title: Australia must act on tokenization or be ‘left behind,’ ASIC chair warns
contentSnippet: ASIC said the regulator will review and relaunch its Innovation Hub to explore new ways ASIC can support financial market innovation.

title: Microsoft Apologizes to Australian 365 Users on AI Pricing, Offers Refund
contentSnippet: The apology arrives 10 days after Australia's competition watchdog sued the tech giant for allegedly concealing cheaper alternatives.

title: Japan’s regulator backs joint stablecoin project by three major banks
contentSnippet: Japan's FSA announced its support for a stablecoin pilot project involving the country's three major banks — Mizuho Bank, MUFG, and SMBC.

title: Seoul Considers Sanctions on North Korea Following US Crypto Crackdown
contentSnippet: Vice Foreign Minister Kim Ji-na says South Korea could adjust its sanctions posture if needed, citing threats from North Korean crypto theft.

title: Man Clones Best Friend: Tom Brady’s New Pup Is a Copy of the Original
contentSnippet: Colossal Bioscience has cloned former NFL star Tom Brady's dog, drawing the ire from some who are calling for a moratorium on pet cloning.

title: Jack Dorsey’s Block sees nearly $2 billion in bitcoin revenue in Q3, nearly 1/3 of its total revenues
contentSnippet: Block’s bitcoin revenue accounted for about $1.97 billion of its total revenue, down from $2.4 billion during the same quarter last year.

title: Microsoft Gave AI Agents Fake Money to Buy Things Online. They Spent It All on Scams
contentSnippet: Microsoft built a simulated economy with hundreds of AI agents acting as buyers and sellers, then watched them fail at basic tasks.

title: Your AI Trading Bot Might Have a Gambling Problem
contentSnippet: New research shows AI models can develop genuine gambling addiction, with some going broke 48% of the time—and the prompts traders use make it dramatically worse.

title: Spanish Council Aims to Sell Bitcoin After 1,000x Jump, Could Fuel Quantum Research
contentSnippet: Tenerife's Technological and Renewable Energy Institute bought 97 Bitcoin in 2012—and now wants to sell them after a 1,000x price increase.

title: Elixir sunsets deUSD synthetic stablecoin following Stream Finance unwinding, aims for full redemptions
contentSnippet: Elixir says it processed redemptions for 80% of deUSD holders, and has snapshotted the remaining balances for future USDC redemptions.

title: Robot Ventures leads $5.2 million seed round for Sprinter, a ‘solving-as-a-service’ startup founded by Ethereum OGs
contentSnippet: Sprinter is a crosschain “solving-as-a-service” infrastructure startup that provides access to collateral-free credit.

title: The Daily: Google to integrate Polymarket and Kalshi data in search results, JPMorgan sees bitcoin reaching $170,000, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Samourai Wallet’s Keonne Rodriguez sentenced to maximum five-year term over crypto mixing service
contentSnippet: Samourai Wallet co-founder Keonne Rodriguez was sentenced to five years in prison and ordered to pay a quarter-million dollar fine on Thursday.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
